net.openhft.chronicle.engine.api.pubsub

Interface TopicPublisher<T,M>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KeyedView
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    QueueView<T,M>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChronicleQueueView, MapTopicPublisher, QueueTopicPublisher, RemoteQueueView, RemoteTopicPublisher

    public interface TopicPublisher<T,M>
extends KeyedView
    Publish to any topic in an Asset group.
